**Preferred:** To keep the report private, please use
[Report a vulnerability](https://github.com/aseguragonzalez/php-seedwork/security/advisories/new) or follow
[SECURITY.md](https://github.com/aseguragonzalez/php-seedwork/blob/main/.github/SECURITY.md).
Do not post sensitive details in a public issue. This template is for non-sensitive security feedback or if you
have already opened an issue.

---

## Description

Describe the security issue.

## Steps to reproduce

How can the vulnerability be reproduced when using the package?

## Impact

What could an attacker do in the context of using this library?

## Suggested fix (optional)

If you have an idea how to fix it.
